short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FasterVisa.co - This extension automatically reschedules US Visa application appointments to an earlier date.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ US Visa Rescheduler - AIS Slots
FasterVisa.co
About:
New user-friendly extension that automates the process of rescheduling US visa application appointments to the nearest available date.

Getting Started
Initial Setup: Upon installation, the extension will redirect you to the AIS US Visa home page.

Credits: When you first install it you will have credits to try out the extension, you can reload credits at any time by clicking on the "Reload Credits" button.

Select Your Country: Choose your country in version English. While the extension should technically work on any language, it is strongly recommended to change the AIS portal language to English.

Open Extension Popup: Click the extension icon in the top right corner of your Chrome browser to open the popup.

Activate the Script: Click "Enable Extension" to activate. You'll be prompted to enter your email and password, allowing the extension to auto-login when the AIS portal logs you out.

Configure Settings: You can reopen the extension popup to adjust the settings as needed.

Key Features
Auto Book: Automatically books an earlier date if one becomes available before your target date.

Frequency of Checks:  Select the type and value of the search frequency (Seconds, Minutes, Hours) that you want to use.

Search From (Date): Define the start date for booking. For example, if set to 10 and today's date is 01/12/2024, the extension will not book a date earlier than 01/12/2024.

Search To (Date): Specify the maximum date you want to search for appointments.

Reset Default Settings: Reset all settings to their defaults. After resetting, you'll need to configure the settings again.

City Selection:
Choose the city you want to check for available seats. Leave the browser tab open and the extension will automatically reserve an earlier seat if it is available according to the selected search frequency. Remember to have the "Automatically Book Appointment" option activated

Do you have any ideas for new features? You can recommend by clicking the support button.

Recommendations:

Soft Block:
The AIS system may temporarily show no slots if you check too frequently. The extension adjusts the checking interval to avoid this. 

Hard Block:
Continuing to check during a soft block can extend it to 24 hours and potentially block your IP. Avoid frequent checks to prevent this.

Default Settings
If the extension doesnâ€™t work, hit the "Reset Default Settings" button in the plugin.

This extension mimics user behavior and does not interact with AIS servers. Please use it responsibly

Current Version 2.2.5 (This version avoids blockages as much as possible, issues was fixed, 405 Error fix, new feature Keep Screen Awake, fix error ASC location and fix TÃ¼rkiye Users)
